translations: 沉重；沉闷；笨拙；迟钝；忧伤

sentences.sentence: An enormous heaviness was coming over me.
sentences.translation: 我突然感到有种巨大的沉重感压迫着我。

sentences.sentence: The mo we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  you start forgiving, you feel lot lighter and years of heaviness lifted magically!
sentences.translation: 而从开始原谅的那刻起，你会感觉轻松了许多，多年的沉重包袱也神奇的不见了！

sentences.sentence: For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.
sentences.translation: 他很想念你们众人，并且极其难过，因为你们听见他病了。
